actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 in order to insure the balancing of environmental considerations with economic and social considerations in complying with provisions of such act.

summary.text: Provides that all agencies of the Federal Government shall consider economic, social and cultural dimensions in complying with the provisions of the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 in order to insure the balancing of environmental considerations with economic and social considerations in complying with provisions of such act.
